All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BadJsonException
Json parse error.
BakeryManager
Manager which starts and stops BakeryWorkers.
BakeryWorker
Class that represents runnable bakery worker.
CommandParser
Utility class that parse command from string.
DeliveryManager
Manager which starts and stops BakeryWorkers.
DeliveryWorker
Class that represents runnable delivery worker.
JsonReader
Reader of jsons.
Manager
Manager that can start or stop something.
Order
Abstract order that have an id and status.
OrderLogger
Logger that can log order message.
OrderMessage
Message of order.
OrderProcessor
Processor that can add new Order.
OrderProcessorImpl
Processor that add pizza order to input queue.
OrderStatus
Statuses of order.
PizzaOrder
Pizza order that have time of delivery.
Pizzeria
Example of Pizzeria.
PizzeriaConfig
Config with name of jsons.
PizzeriaInitialisation
A class that initializes a pizzeria and creates a PizzeriaManager to start a pizzeria and an OrderProcessor to send an order.
PizzeriaManager
Manager which starts and stops Bakery and Delivery managers.
